import { useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import { ScriptsContext } from "../../context/ScriptsContext"; const LeftContent = ()=>{ const {leftMenuChange, menuName, jobFreelanceMenu, searchBar} = useContext(ScriptsContext) //Left Menu Change useEffect(()=> { searchBar.current.value = "" console.log(searchBar.current.value)}, []) return (
{/* Freelancer - Jobs Content */} {jobFreelanceMenu[menuName]}
) } export default LeftContent;
